acf.content:
Few people can say they live in the grounds of an historic country estate. Fewer still are able to combine such exceptional surroundings and convenience.

Alderley Park is a unique location and one of South Manchester’s most desirable, within minutes of Cheshire’s social HUB, Alderley Edge. This exclusive residential enclave offers THREE distinct styles of living in a collection of homes, beautifully designed by internationally revered architect ROBERT ADAM and exquisitely created by renowned luxury developer PH Homes.

Alongside the country estate’s walled and water gardens, ornamental lakes and ponds and restful arboretum, residents will have an array of facilities on their doorstep. A leisure and sports club, including a gym, tennis courts, cricket and football pitches; TOP CLASS DINING and accommodation in the original listed buildings; and even its own Farm Shop.

This tranquil retreat, surrounded by natural beauty, creates a LIFESTYLE that redefines Alderley living.
